section.title: Viewing Virtual Machines and Templates
section.para: Access a tree view of the virtual machines and templates for a provider from the Provider Summary.

procedure.title: To View Virtual Machines and Templates for a Provider

step.para: Click the provider to view the virtual machines and templates.
From accordion menu, click [label]#Relationships#, then click VMs & Templates.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The virtual machines and templates are displayed in a tree view. Hover over a virtual machine or template and its virtual thumbnail displays on the screen.
